feature_model.name: Digital_Video_System

meta.data: Feature model of a digital video system

Detlef Streitferdt, Matthias Riebisch, and Ilka Philippow. Details of formalized relations in feature models using OCL. Engineering of Computer-Based Systems, 2003. Proceedings. 10th IEEE International Conference and Workshop on the, pages 297?304, April 2003.

feature_model.feature_tree: :r dvs(_id_0) :m control(_id_1) :m remote(_id_2) :o telephone(_id_3) :o sms(_id_4) :o net(net) :o web(_id_5) :o wap(_id_6) :m email(_id_7) :o edit(_id_8) :o add_music(add_music) :m play(_id_9) :o slides(_id_10) :o audio(audio) :m video(_id_11) :o network_hw(network_hw) :o modem(_id_12) :o ethernet(_id_13) :m server_pc(_id_14) :o network(_id_15) :o irda_port(irda_port) :m play(_id_16) :o on_demand(_id_17) :o client_pc(_id_18) :o network(_id_19) :o handheld(handheld)
feature_model.constraints: c1:~net or network_hw c2:~handheld or irda_port c3:~add_music or audio
